mage_cron.label: Use Magento Cron
mage_cron.comment:
Setting to No will prevent the Magento Cron from triggering the import process for this module.
For more details, check the Cron Settings section in the Bronto » Advanced tab.

interval.label: Interval
interval.comment: Set this value larger than your cron.php launch period.

limit.label: Limit
limit.comment: Total Customers to process every run.

sync_limit.label: Sync Limit
sync_limit.comment: Total Customers to sync to queue at a time.
